backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented app features to corresponding frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each major frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder with no content.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root div and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes wrapped in the SiteLayout component.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Layout component providing persistent header, navigation, and footer around page content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, auth client setup, login flow, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining warm restaurant-themed color palette for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point initializing QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page with hero, story, mission, and highlight sections using static text and icons.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact details including address, phone, email, hours, and a map section.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows gallery sections for interior, food, and party images with icons and image grids.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with a hero section, opening hours, quick links, and CTA elements.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPage.tsx: Renders categorized menu sections with icons and item lists including names and prices.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom fonts, color tokens, container settings, shadows, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the projectâ€™s state, including versioning, required images, and a list of implemented website features for the restaurant build.
